meanings.definition: The process of making or becoming sound or healthy again.
meanings.sent1: Her healing after the surgery was quick and impressive.
meanings.sent2: The healing of a wound takes time and patience.
meanings.sent3: The healing of his broken phone screen was a costly affair.
meanings.sent4: The healing of a broken heart can be a long and painful journey.
meanings.sent5: The healing of the forest after the fire was a beautiful sight to behold.

meanings.definition: The act of restoring to health or soundness.
meanings.sent1: The healing of the patient was a testament to the doctor's skill.
meanings.sent2: His healing after the illness was gradual but steady.
meanings.sent3: The healing of the old building made it look brand new.
meanings.sent4: The healing of a community after a disaster requires unity and support.
meanings.sent5: The healing of a relationship takes effort and understanding from both sides.

meanings.definition: The process of repairing or mending.
meanings.sent1: The healing of the broken vase was done with care and precision.
meanings.sent2: His healing of the torn book pages was meticulous.
meanings.sent3: The healing of the leaky roof was a temporary fix.
meanings.sent4: The healing of a friendship after a misunderstanding is important.
meanings.sent5: The healing of a broken toy brought joy to the child.
